page.title: 04COMMUNICATIONS>>> TELEPHONE
page.content: Many people in Malpas have their own telephone. This instrument makes communication between people very easy and extremely quickly.{The phone keeps {people in touch for buisnes and {pleasure. It is a useful means of {communication. All calls made on the telephone go through the exchange. There is only one exchange in Malpas.It takes about 10 seconds for a call to be put through to AMERICA which you can dial direct. {Some people do not have their own {telephone they have to use the public {telephone services.(See page 5) In an {EMERGENCY} you can obtain help by dialing {999 }to get help from the{ {POLICE FIRE BRIGADE OR AMBULANCE} this service is free of charge and saves many lives each year. ALL 999 calls go straight to the operator.
